validateaddress.text1: The COINiD Vault will independently generate the expected receive address.
validateaddress.text2: If it generates a different address. The wallet might have been compromised or been created with a different private key.
validateaddress.text3: In that case the receive address must not be used or shared!

sweepprivatekey.text2: The private key will be scanned and stored in your COINiD Vault.

setup.cold.before: Before you begin to setup your cold wallet you need to setup an offline device.
setup.cold.text: Your cold wallet private keys are never exposed to an online device. Offline storage is the safest way to store your funds.
setup.cold.howto: How to setup an offline device
setup.hot.text: Similar to a transaction account, funds stored on your hot wallet are available for easy and immediate access.
setup.hot.privatekeys: Private keys are stored securely in the COINiD Vault installed on this device.

addresstypes.p2pkh.description: Recommended address type. Lower tx size and fees compared to legacy.
